  • Method Details

    • getInstance

      public static User getInstance() throws SQLException
      Throws:
      SQLException

    • createUser

      public int createUser(String user, String hashedPassword, String salt) throws SQLException
      Creates a new user entry (CREATE)
      Parameters:
      user - the username
      hashedPassword - the hashed password
      salt - the salt used for hashing
      Returns:
      the id of the created entry, or -1 if an error occurs
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database access error occurs

    • getUserById

      public Map<String,Object> getUserById(int id) throws SQLException
      Retrieves a user entry by its id (READ)
      Parameters:
      id - the entry id
      Returns:
      a Map containing the entry data, or null if not found
      Throws:
      SQLException

    • getUserByUser

      public Map<String,Object> getUserByUser(String user) throws SQLException
      Retrieves a user entry by username (READ)
      Parameters:
      user - the username
      Returns:
      a Map containing the entry data (including salt), or null if not found
      Throws:
      SQLException

    • userExists

      public boolean userExists(String user) throws SQLException
      Checks if a username already exists (READ)
      Parameters:
      user - the username to check
      Returns:
      true if the username exists, false otherwise
      Throws:
      SQLException

    • updateUser

      public boolean updateUser(int id, String user, String hashedPassword, String salt)
      Updates a user entry (UPDATE)
      Parameters:
      id - the id of the entry to update
      user - the new username
      hashedPassword - the new hashed password
      salt - the new salt
      Returns:
      true if the update succeeded, false otherwise

    • deleteUser

      public boolean deleteUser(int id) throws SQLException
      Deletes a user entry (DELETE)
      Parameters:
      id - the id of the entry to delete
      Returns:
      true if the deletion succeeded, false otherwise
      Throws:
      SQLException

    • deleteUserByUser

      public boolean deleteUserByUser(String user) throws SQLException
      Deletes a user entry by username (DELETE)
      Parameters:
      user - the username
      Returns:
      true if the deletion succeeded, false otherwise
      Throws:
      SQLException
